metadata.title: CVE-2024-45338 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker can craft an input to the Parse functions that would beprocessed non-linearly with respect to its length, resulting in extremelyslow parsing. This could cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: adsys package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
golang-golang-x-net package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
google-guest-agent package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
